org.cyclops.cyclopscore.inventory

Interface IValueNotifier

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExtendedInventoryContainer, InventoryContainer, InventoryContainerConfigurable, ItemInventoryContainer, ScrollingInventoryContainer, TileInventoryContainer, TileInventoryContainerConfigurable

    public interface IValueNotifier
    Used for sending values from server to clients in guis. Similar to Minecraft's ICrafting.
    See Also:
    IValueNotifiable

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getGuiId() 
      java.lang.String getGuiModId() 
      net.minecraft.nbt.NBTTagCompound getValue(int valueId)
      Get the value for the given value id.
      java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> getValueIds() 
      void setValue(int valueId, net.minecraft.nbt.NBTTagCompound value)
      Set the value for given value id.

    • Method Detail

      • getGuiModId

        java.lang.String getGuiModId()
        Returns:
        The mod the gui belongs to.

      • getGuiId

        int getGuiId()
        Returns:
        The id of the gui.

      • setValue

        void setValue(int valueId,
              net.minecraft.nbt.NBTTagCompound value)
        Set the value for given value id. This will send a packet if it has changed. If called on the client, a packet to the server will be sent. If called on the server, a packet to the client will be sent.
        Parameters:
        valueId - The value id.
        value - The new value.

      • getValueIds

        java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> getValueIds()
        Returns:
        All available value ids.

      • getValue

        net.minecraft.nbt.NBTTagCompound getValue(int valueId)
        Get the value for the given value id.
        Parameters:
        valueId - The value id.
        Returns:
        The value or null.
